All these snaps are updated when security vulnerabilities that affect them are discovered. Bugs for them can be filled in https://bugs.launchpad.net/snappy-hwe-snaps and documentation can be found in https://docs.ubuntu.com/core/en/stacks/ .

Canonical also maintains the base parts of Ubuntu Core systems, including the '''core''', '''core18''', and '''snapd''' snaps.
